a_0.formal problem:
theorem
fixes x :: real and f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = x powr ((x + 1) powr x)"
and h1 : "x = 2"
shows  "f x = 512"
a_0.formal solution:
(* ### Problem
 Evaluate \[x^{{(x+1)}^x}\] when $x = 2$. The final Answer is 512
 ### Proof
 We see that \begin{align} 2^{3^2} &= 2^{\left(3^2\right)} \\ &= 2^9 \\ &= \boxed{512}. \end{align}
 *)

theorem
fixes x :: real and f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = x powr ((x + 1) powr x)"
and h1 : "x = 2"
shows  "f x = 512"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
a_0.informal problem: Find the value of the function $f(x) = x^{(x+1)^x}$ when $x=2$. The final answer is $512$.

a_1.formal problem:
theorem
fixes x :: real
assumes h0 : "x = 2"
shows  "(x powr ((x + 1) powr x)) = 512"
a_1.formal solution:
(* ### Problem
 Evaluate \[x^{{(x+1)}^x}\] when $x = 2$. The final Answer is 512
 ### Proof
 We see that \begin{align} 2^{3^2} &= 2^{\left(3^2\right)} \\ &= 2^9 \\ &= \boxed{512}. \end{align}
 *)

theorem
fixes x :: real
assumes h0 : "x = 2"
shows  "(x powr ((x + 1) powr x)) = 512"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
a_1.informal problem: What is the value of $x^{(x+1)^x}$ when $x = 2$? The final answer is 512.

a_6.formal problem:
theorem
fixes x :: real and f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = x powr ((x + 1) powr x)"
and h1 : "f 2 = 512"
shows  "f 2 = 512"
a_6.formal solution:
(* ### Problem
 Evaluate \[x^{{(x+1)}^x}\] when $x = 2$. The final Answer is 512
 ### Proof
 We see that \begin{align} 2^{3^2} &= 2^{\left(3^2\right)} \\ &= 2^9 \\ &= \boxed{512}. \end{align}
 *)

theorem
fixes x :: real and f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = x powr ((x + 1) powr x)"
and h1 : "f 2 = 512"
shows  "f 2 = 512"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
a_6.informal problem: Given the function $f(x) = x^{(x+1)^x}$, find the value of $f(2)$. The final answer is 512.
